TEXT.TITLE: METROPOLITAN FEDERAL <MFTN> TO MAKE ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Metropolitan Federal Savings and Loan Association said it has signed a letter of intent to acquire American Trust of Hendersonville, Tenn., for an undisclosed amount of cash. American Trust had year-end assets of over 40 mln dlrs. Reuter
